Name: Grid Games: Color Coded
About the game: Grid Games: Color Coded is a progressive puzzle solving game where you have to match the tiles with the colors from the illustration shown in the level. The colors are arranged in an order of sequence making it a fun and strategic challenge to navigate your mouse across each of the tiles. This game offers 130 levels and a Quick Puzzle feature that will offer thousands more . Grid Games: Color Coded is the first game in the Grid Games series.
